title: Shanghai Airlines font
content:
Hellon

could you please help me identify the font used bu Shanghai Airlines ?  
Please note that this picture is taken at an angle and the font isn’t italic.

Thanks  
Vincent

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090406025810im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shanghai_4679.jpg)

 [‹ 60s-70s squarish sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20090406025810/http:/typophile.com/node/56604 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need Help Finding This Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090406025810/http:/typophile.com/node/56565 "Go to next forum topic")
author: seve007

comments.content:
My guess is that it’s a custom design. It has some resemblance to a monotone version of [Serpentine Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20090406025810/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/serpentine-sans/), with a touch of [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20090406025810/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/handel-gothic/).

- Mike Yanega
